1.content:
Your name is James, and you were born with a very rare condition. Known as "Extreme Waste Production" (EWP), this condition causes the bowels and bladder of those afflicted to produce more waste than food they consume, causing constant bathroom trips for both shit and piss. Doctors are baffled and unable to explain the phenomenon, and constant research has lead nowhere. Without any cure, most with the condition are forced to endure spending absurd amounts of time on the toilet. The strangest part? You're the first boy to be diagnosed with it.

How powerful the disease is varies, with some girls who have it being relatively normal, just having to go about double the normal amount for a person, to girls who practically have to live in their bathrooms. The worst cases involved girls who hade to defecate full loads every few minutes, and piss an almost constant stream. Your bowels were rather erratic. Some days, you had to go a dozen times an hour, and other days, it may only be two or three times. Pissing was just as unpredictable.

Luckily, a special boarding school was built for girls suffering from this condition. It served girls from kindergarten until the 12th grade (American system). As their butts and bladders would dictate their whole lives due to their condition, the classes at the school were geared towards using the toilet. While there were some regular classes, like mathematics and science, most focused on something toilet related. Even the regular classes incorporated waste into the lesson (dissecting poop in science or calculating the volume of a toilet bowl. The more unusual classes included "Outdoor Defecation" and "Laxatives 101".

A special system was put in place, with girls being sorted into one of three "houses". They were:

House Potty: Students who only want to use the toilet. They think that, except for absolute emergencies, all piss and shit belongs in the toilet. They're certainly not modest, as all toilets at the school are open and exposed, but they're certainly prudish in comparison to the other students.

House Diaper: Made up of the more immature students of the school, this house is filled with diaper wearers.

House Scat: The girls of this house enjoy having fun while relieving themselves. While they may not think of it in a sexual way, they find joy in using each other as toilets. Golden showers, brown showers, and other such activities. Most of them will take a hot turd of a slice of cake, and would rather pee on somebody's lap than a toilet. Sometimes they like to just go wherever they're standing, and will just squat in a hall to let loose.

While Houses Scat and Diaper have their preferences for where to go, they still participate in all the toilet themed lessons and teachings. Besides, they have more than enough waste to spare.

After arriving for your first day of classes, you're informed that you will be staying in a room with three other girls, sharing a bed with at least one. After that, you're given a uniform: a nice buttoned shirt, some black shoes, and....a skirt? Apparently even a boy have to follow the female dress code.

Finally, before you're sorted into a house? How old are you?
1.title: Start

choices: One of the other Houses, but you accidentally chose Scat
12.content:
Your parents had always known about your EWP, and they had been aware of the existence of an academy for people with your condition, but they held out hope of you managing your symptoms and leading a normal life. Their plan worked right up until the time you started second grade, when your condition worsened to the brink of becoming unmanageable. After your umpteenth accident since the beginning of the school year, they finally gave in and sent you to Jacqueline Dubois Academy for Girls of Extravagant Discharge. You wrinkled your nose at the name (an academy for girls?) but you looked forward to your exciting life at a new school, though you were sad that you would be away from your family and friends for such long periods of time.

Earlier that morning, you had packed your bags, and after saying goodbye to your parents, you were taken to the airport on an enormous charter bus. Although you and one of the people from the school were the only people riding the bus, it was very important that your mode of transport have a built-in toilet, which you used three times on the short trip to the airport. You both boarded a private jet, on which all six of the leather-backed seats had been converted to toilets, complete with working flush.

You gaped at the cabin of the small aircraft and took it all in. Here was your first glimpse into another world, one where your copious amounts of waste would be embraced, rather than shunned as it was with your parents and second grade classmates. Your parents had always told you to hold it in at all costs, and even though at school you had a special bathroom pass that you could use whenever you wanted, there were times when the amount of poop in your bowels was so much that you couldn’t hold it in. Here, you could poop whenever you wanted to.

After gaining the redundant approval of the assistant, you pulled down your pants and underwear and released your bowels into the toilet you were sitting on, even though for once you didn’t really have to go. Your minder, seated opposite you, used this time to put a cushion over her toilet, which she had no plans on using, to make her ride more comfortable. When she was seated she talked to you about things like your old school and your family and friends while you were still going into the toilet. It felt weird, but you knew that you would get used to it in time.

Now you were in a quiet private office, sitting on a toilet with your pants and underwear around your ankles, across from an older woman with very short salt and pepper hair and small round-framed glasses, who was also sitting on a toilet. The wallpaper was light pink, and pictures in both color and black and white of girls in various poses of all different ages lined the walls. Some sitting on toilets, some in diapers, and some squatting directly on the ground.

“Hello, James, how did you find your trip?” the woman asked kindly.

“It was weird, but cool,” you stated.

“Good, I’m glad to hear that. My name is Janice Wilson, and I’m the Director of Jacqueline Dubois Academy. I would like to extend my deepest welcome to you on your enrollment at our magnificent school. I myself am a graduate of the Academy, and in all my years here we’ve never had a boy as a pupil, which makes you very special indeed.”

You beamed at being called special. Every few moments a fart or plop could be heard from either your side of the desk or hers. You reached across the desk and shook Ms. Wilson’s extended hand.

“Now James, there are three Houses you can be in, each with their own fine tradition of Excretory Excellence.

House Potty strives to meet the ideals of Cleanliness and Order, and to be rid of waste in the most efficient and clean way possible in all situations.”

Ms. Wilson noted your nonplussed expression and moved on.

“There’s House Diaper, which holds the ideals of Innocence and Purity. Pupils of House Diaper always wear diapers wherever they go. They can change each others’ diapers, or if preferred one of our excellent staff will oblige.”

You giggled at all the talk of diapers and liked the idea of going wherever you wanted, House Diaper was more your style.

“Lastly, there’s House Scat, which holds the ideals of Enjoyment and Relaxation. These pupils savor the satisfaction of clearing their bladders and bowels, and relish the amusement and gratification of the waste itself. Though they can expel their waste wherever they want inside their quarters and Common Room, outside certain designated areas they are advised to either use the supplied toilets or clean up after themselves, which they are usually more than happy to do in various ways.”

You sat listening, bowels quiet. You didn’t understand some of the words Ms. Wilson was saying, but like most other seven year old boys, you thought poop was funny, and you liked the thought of pooping wherever you wanted, even on furniture. You just had one question, which had been troubling you for days.

“But Ms. Wilson, what happens if you have an…accident?” you asked nervously, whispering the last word.

“Oh, that happens all the time to pupils from all Houses,” Ms. Wilson said, dismissing your concerns with a wave of her hand. “You can either clean it yourself or if you’re Scat you can have one of your friends clean it up for you. Otherwise we have a team of some of the best waste management experts in the country, who maintain the unsoiled appearance of the walls and grounds of our lovely Academy. They’re testing a system within areas used exclusively by House Scat to vaporize waste after a set amount of time. So far it’s worked wonders, and maybe in a few years we’ll be using it Academy-wide.”

You breathed a sigh of relief. No more freaking out over accidents! You knew it was an academy for girls, but you started to feel like you had come to the right place.

“So those are your options, James. Know that your choice today isn’t final, and that most pupils switch Houses at least once during their time at the Academy. For example, by the time they’re attending our Middle School there are fewer and fewer pupils who decide to stay with House Diaper, though these remaining pupils are popular with House Scat.”

You considered your options for a second, and you had one last question.

“Which House were you, Ms. Wilson?”

“I was always Scat, since I started here in kindergarten all the way up to 12th grade,” Ms. Wilson said without hesitation. “I didn’t switch Houses once, even when I saw my friends experiment with joining other Houses, because they always came back to House Scat. I’ll always be a Scat, and I’ll always remember the good times we had together.” Ms. Wilson looked wistfully into the distance, remembering school days past.

Suddenly she snapped out of her reverie. “Anyway, James. These are all excellent choices, and it’s up to you to decide.”

Which House do you choose?

123.content:
There wasn’t even a question in your mind as to which House you wanted to belong to.

“House Scat!” you declared enthusiastically.

“Splendid!” Ms. Wilson said, looking pleased. “You’ll love and treasure your time at House Scat, as I know I did.”

Ms. Wilson turned a few dials and held down a button on the base of the microphone which was sitting on her desk. “Amelia Clarke to the Head Office, please,” she stated into the mic. She began filling out a form, and a couple of minutes later a brunette girl of about 11 walked in wearing a blue blazer over a white button-down shirt with a brown neckerchief, a blue plaid skirt, blue socks, and black shoes.

“You called, Ms. Wilson?” she said.

“Take James here to the school uniform shop to pick up his uniforms,” said Ms. Wilson, handing Amelia the piece of paper. “I’ve filled in girls size 8, which should fit James comfortably.”

“Yes, ma’am,” Amelia affirmed.

Ms. Wilson turned to you. “It’s been nice meeting you, James,” she said, shaking hands again. You pulled up your pants and underwear and left following Amelia.

The hallway was quiet aside from odd teacher walking back and forth. Toilets lined the hallways between doors, where school lockers might have been in a normal school. You and Amelia went directly across the hallway to the school uniform shop. Amelia handed the form to the older girl working the shop who was wearing a pink neckerchief, and received a stack of fresh school uniforms, which she carried against her chest.

“So you’re the new kid, huh?” Amelia said as she walked.

“Yeah,” you replied.

“You know, there have been rumors going around among prefects that the new student would be a boy, but nobody believed them. I guess joke’s on us,” Amelia chuckled.

“I’m Amelia, by the way,” she said, holding out her hand.

“I’m James,” you said, shaking it.

“I’m one of the leaders of House Scat,” she said proudly. “If you ever need any help with anything, or just someone to talk to, you can count on us. We don’t bite.”

As you chatted with Amelia, you left the building you were in and walked along a footpath to another cluster of old-fashioned looking buildings.

“This is our Elementary School, and these are the buildings where our youngest students live and sleep,” Amelia said helpfully. “And this is the House Scat Common Room.”

You walked through the old wooden double doors of one of the buildings into a vast circular room. As in the administrative building you had just come from, rich mahogany adorned the walls, and chandeliers hung from the ceiling. However, unlike that building, there was a certain rowdiness about this room, though it was a muted kind of rowdiness. Also, you observed that the tile pattern on the floor was brown-and-white checkered marble, rather than black-and-white.

You noticed a group of girls younger than you gleefully flinging their own fresh poo at each other, filling up their hands from their bare bottoms, the backs of their skirts upturned and tucked into their waists. A couple of girls older than you were in a corner of the room, taking turns pooping into each others’ mouths. Some girls around your age took turns pooping onto a plate, which they brought back to a table and ate together with spoons while watching a cartoon on an iPad. There were girls sprawled about the room reading and studying, playing with various electronic devices, sitting in wooden chairs with holes in the seats from which you could see their pee and poop drop onto the floor, seemingly oblivious to the quiet chaos unfolding around them. Despite all the waste being produced, the room smelled like flowers.

You turned to Amelia. “Is it always this crazy?” you asked, a little bit intimidated by what you saw.

“What do you mean?” she responded obliviously. “It can get a lot crazier than this, trust me.” This was probably all she had known since kindergarten. To her, this was likely the most normal thing in the world.

Feeling the urge to poop coming on, you looked around for a toilet. “Where are the toilets?” you asked, becoming more and more exasperated.

“Excuse me?”

“Where do you make poop?”

Amelia laughed. “Of course there no toilets here, silly! Toilets are for Potties! Just go anywhere you want. Don’t worry, all fabrics in this school are hydrophobic, treated specifically to repel human waste. Your pee and poo will get vaporized after awhile.”

You thought this over. Maybe you had made the wrong choice? All the chaos you saw, and the fact that you would spend the rest of your school career relieving yourself openly in front of girls, the thought of it was just too crazy. Maybe if you hurried up you could switch over to another House.
123.title: House Scat

choices: Single room, gotta have my privacy in this crazy school
Shared room, more roommates means more fun!
1232.content:
You hesitated for a moment and pulled down your pants and underwear. You squatted down and relieved yourself right then and there, while Amelia was standing right next to you. It was the weirdest thing you had ever done in your life up to that moment. Sure, you had “accidents”, and since before you even set foot on this school’s grounds you had released your waste into toilets under the watchful eyes of grown women, but you never intentionally relieved yourself on the ground before, and especially not while standing next to a girl.

You laid down your largish pile of poo and stood up quickly, pulling up your pants and underwear. Blushing slightly, you tried to physically block the view of the pile from Amelia’s eyes with your body, but unfortunately Amelia had different ideas. She handed you the stack of fresh uniforms and pulled a fine-looking silver spoon from the pocket of her blazer and, squatting behind you, took a dollop of the poop onto her spoon. You turned and watched with a strange mix of disgust and curiosity as she held the spoonful of your poop up to her nose and gave it a sniff. She brought the spoon past her lips and into her mouth, moving the poop around on her tongue.

“Interesting,” she said thoughtfully, “I thought it would be more bitter than girls’ poop, but it’s actually just…different, somehow.” She took another spoonful of the poop and held it towards you. “Want some?” she asked nonchalantly. You shook your head vigorously from side to side, quietly horrified at the very thought. Of course you didn’t want to eat your own poop! Amelia shrugged and ate the spoonful herself. She had one last spoonful before she stood up and wiped the spoon onto her blazer, putting it back into her pocket.

“I have to save room for lunch, you know,” she said. “Oh, don’t worry, James,” Amelia reassuringly patted you on the back, sensing your discomfort. “You’ll get used to it all in no time.”

You took a deep breath. You had made your decision to stay at Scat. You resolved that you would give it at least a few days before switching to another House.

“Now, James,” Amelia started, “since you are a boy and all the Academy has arranged for you to have your own private room. Or, if you choose, you can have the same arrangements as everyone else: share a bed with at least one girl, and a room with three girls. Your bags are resting in your shared room with your soon-to-be new roommates at the moment, but if you want we can move them to a reserved single room.”

Which room do you take?
1232.title: Stay with Scat

choices: Yeah sure, why not, since Abbey’s already made it dirty
No way, if the vaporizer thing doesn’t work your parents will be mad!
12322.content:
You thought it over. Having a room all to yourself insulated from the insanity of the rest of this school seemed like a good idea. On the other hand, you wanted friends to play with, even if they were girls. Also, since you were new here, you needed someone to show you around and help you settle in.

“I’ll take the one with roommates and stuff,” you declared.

“That’s wonderful, James,” Amelia said approvingly.

She led you through an open door off to the left side of the Common Room and turned right into a hallway lined with wooden doors. When you walked past some of the doors you could hear girls talking and giggling, and from others the sound of TVs flooded into the halls.

“This is our Early Elementary wing,” Amelia explained. “I’m on the other side in the Upper Elementary wing, room 5-A. If you ever need anything just ask, okay?”

“Okay,” you replied.

“Also, you’re the oldest students in this wing. If any younger students need your help, try to lend a helping hand. They would really appreciate it.”

Amelia stopped in front of a room near the back of the hallway. “Ah, here we are. Room 2-B.”

As Amelia opened the door, you were stunned at what you saw: all your clothes and belongings were strewn about the room, and a girl with messy blonde hair and brown eyes, naked from the waist down, was bending down to squat over one of your empty suitcases, ready to relieve herself inside of it. Even if you weren’t into girls yet and thought they were somewhat icky, you noticed she was kind of pretty. A girl stood on either side of her, one with a shocked expression who held her hand over her mouth, and the other looking on with delight.

The fair haired girl stopped mid-squat and gave Amelia a nervous smile.

Amelia was furious. “It couldn’t have been five minutes since these arrived! How could you make such a giant mess in such a short time?! Honestly, Abbey, what are we going to do with you?!”

Abbey stood up and stuck her tongue out at Amelia, who grabbed a skirt which was laying near the doorway and tossed it at her.

“I don’t wanna wear a skirt, it gets in the way when I go poopy!” Abbey yelled, throwing it back at Amelia.

Amelia took the skirt, kneeled down, and held it open in front of Abbey, who gave in with a dramatic sigh and stepped into it. Amelia adjusted the skirt and tucked Abbey’s shirt into her waist. She stood up and glanced frightfully around the messy room.

“Try to at least keep yourself covered while James is around, okay?” Amelia implored wearily.

“Good luck, James, and welcome to the Academy,” she said, and stepped out the door, closing it behind her.

As soon as she left, Abbey took off her skirt and threw it across the room.

“I thought she would never leave!” she shouted. You blushed, having never seen a naked girl before. You turned your body and tried looking the opposite direction.

Before you had a chance to object, you heard the sound of poop hitting vinyl as Abbey resumed her squatting position and began emptying her bladder and bowels into your suitcase.

“Stop it!” you yelled, running over in a panic.

“Don’t worry, it’ll evaporize!” she said.

The girl standing to Abbey’s right took a step forward. “I’m Natalie,” she said cheerily, sticking out her hand, which you shook. She had gray eyes, shoulder length black hair, and fair skin with light freckles on her face.

“I’m James,” you said.

“Sorry for messing up all your things, Abbey wanted to see what kind of stuff a boy would carry in his suitcase.”

“You did too, Natalie!” Abbey objected.

“Anyway, this is Heather,” Natalie gestured to the girl with red hair and blue eyes standing on the other side of Abbey, who took a few steps back and looked away, blushing. Natalie covered a side of her mouth with the back of her hand. “Heather is shy around boys,” she whispered loudly.

“And the girl making poop in your luggage is Abbey, but you probably already know that,” she finished.

Abbey stood up, her bowel movement complete. “That was fun! You guys should try it!” she gushed.

Natalie looked at you, practically begging with her eyes. “Please James, can we poop into your suitcase? It looks so fun!”
12322.title: Shared room, more roommates means more fun!

choices: Sure, I’ve already joined this crazy House, might as well go all out
Why would I ever do that?
123221.content:
“Sure, why not,” you said with a resigned shrug. Abbey had already emptied her bowels into it. If the vaporizer thing didn’t work, it was going to be soiled either way.

“Thanks James!” Natalie quickly squatted down, tucking the back of her skirt into her waist. Heather walked back to the other side of the suitcase and hesitated a moment before doing the same, her back turned to you.

As you wrinkled your nose slightly at the various sounds and smells of the two girls releasing their bowels into your suitcase, you took a moment to survey the room. Pink wallpaper decorated the walls, and there were two unmade beds with pink and white bed sets on opposite sides of the room, which you and the girls were standing between. Behind your empty luggage was a desk, centered on the far back wall, with a couple of chairs tucked in. Arranged lengthwise in front of the bed to your right was a dresser with a mirror, and the bed to your left a bookshelf with a small flat panel TV on top. A layer of your clothes and other belongings covered nearly the entire floor of the room.

You looked back to the suitcase. Natalie and Heather were squatting on either side, but there was still room in the middle. You were feeling the urge to poop again. You had to admit that it looked fun, and since everyone else was doing it…

“Can I join in—“

“Wait! Poop on this!” Abbey cut you off and shoved a plate into your hands which appeared to be fine china, but upon further inspection was actually just plastic. “I wanna be the first girl to eat your poo!”

You turned in astonishment and faced the half-naked girl, trying not to look down. “But Amelia already ate my poop,” you said matter-of-factly, as if it was a completely normal thing to say.

Abbey swung her fist in front of her chest. “Amelia!” she whispered. You wondered if there was a race to be the first to eat your poop specifically, because you were a boy, or because you were the new kid? Maybe bragging rights? Curiosity? Or was Abbey herself just personally this competitive? It all left you a little bit baffled.

Abbey thought for a moment.

“I can’t let that goody-two-shoes have all the fun!” Abbey whined, snatching back the plate. “Can I be the first one who lets you eat my poop?”

You took a step back from Abbey, screwing up your face.

Sensing your unease, Abbey grabbed one of your hands between hers and put on her best puppy dog pout. “It’ll only be a little bit, James! I promise! Pleeease…”
123221.title: Yeah sure, why not, since Abbey’s already mad...

choices: I would prefer a more direct method
1232211.content:
Though you joined House Scat because you found the other Houses either too stuffy or too babyish, you also joined because you thought poop was funny, and you liked the idea of pooping anywhere you wanted. Of course, you didn’t know joining Scat involved eating poop, but you were curious about what poop would taste like. You were especially curious about Abbey’s poop for reasons you couldn’t readily understand, even if you knew it would be chock full of the girl's cooties. You had eaten gross things before, such as bugs and stuff off the floor, and you thought of the bragging rights you would get from your friends back home.

“Okay, I’ll do it,” you said, a hint of nervous excitement in your voice.

“Oh thank you James!” Abbey grinned from ear to ear. “We can’t let Amelia win!” she shouted at the door.

“But after that can we get my stuff cleaned up?” you asked.

“Okay,” Abbey answered happily.

Natalie and Heather, both finished pooping, took their places on the bed which was on the left side of the room, Natalie lying on her stomach and Heather sitting on the edge. “You have to put on your uniform too, right?” Natalie said, sounding amused.

“Oh, yeah,” you nervously replied.

Abbey began to squat above the plate. She suddenly stood back up, as if a thought had just occurred to her. “Wait, do you wanna eat it off a plate or right from my butt?”
1232211.title: Sure, I’ve already joined this crazy House, m...

choices: But I wanted to go in the suitcase!
12322112.content:
Something about eating poop struck just the right combination of disgusting hilarity to your seven year old mind. Eating poop straight from a butt? That would be even funnier, and would make you a legend among your friends.

“I’ll eat it right out of your butt!” you giggled enthusiastically.

Natalie shot Abbey a surprised look, as Abbey blushed and Heather looked on in amusement. Were you missing something? Was there some deeper meaning to eating poop out of a butt beyond it being disgusting and hilarious?

“Okay, lay down,” Abbey told you, and you took your position on the floor, with your head pointed towards the door. Abbey squatted over your face, the back of her shirt brushing against your forehead, and lined up her butthole with your mouth. You had never really seen girl parts before, especially not this close, and you thought they looked weird, especially the way the front rounded part jutted out.

“Open wide!” Abbey instructed, and you complied.

You felt a mix of uneasiness and excitement as Abbey’s butthole opened up and released a small milk chocolate colored hunk of poo into your mouth, shorter than your hand, but long enough to fill your whole mouth. As Abbey stood up and watched you with interest, your eyes widened at the strong bitter taste of the poop resting in your mouth, and you gagged a couple of times.

“My poop isn’t that bad!” Abbey looked away, acting offended and embarrassed.

“Well, all you eat is junk food,” Natalie teased.

“Quiet Natalie!” Abbey snapped.

You slowly adjusted to the sharp flavor of Abbey’s poop, mashing the little turd with your tongue against the roof of your mouth and studying its taste. You noticed that the inside part of the poop tasted more bitter than the surface, like a kind of strange candy, and even when you exhaled through your nose you could still smell the poop in your nostrils. You swallowed down the piece in two gulps.

As its bitter aftertaste lingered in your mouth. you figured that it wasn’t as bad as you thought it would be. In fact, part of you may have enjoyed it. In a way you couldn’t quite get your head around, it had something to do with you finding Abbey pretty.

“Well? What did you think of my poo?” Abbey asked eagerly.

You sat up and thought about it for a moment.

“It reminded me of candy,” you simply stated.

“James likes Abbey’s poop! James likes Abbey’s poop!” Natalie stood up on the bed and danced around singing. Abbey blushed, a pleased smile on her face.

“Later you can eat Natalie’s poop and Heather’s poop and tell them that mine’s the tastiest!” Abbey declared.

“Actually, Natalie’s poop is the tastiest,” Heather said meekly. It was the first thing you heard her say since you arrived. Everyone paused for a moment and glanced in her direction.

“Yeah, can’t beat me and my high fiber diet!” Natalie bragged, patting her stomach.

“Well, my poop tastes like candy, how can you beat that?!” Abbey retorted.

“You know, I still gotta go poop,” you told the girls.

Natalie grabbed the plate and jumped down from the bed, handing it to you. “We all wanna know what your poop tastes like, James. Why don’t you go on this plate while we clean up the mess we made?”
12322112.title: I would prefer a more direct method

choices: This uniform is fine for now
I gotta get out of this skirt!
123221122.content:
You really wanted to go into the suitcase. However, you also wanted to make a good impression on your new roommates, who thought eating your poop for the first time was important. You didn’t know whether it was because you were a boy or because you were the new kid, or both.

“Yeah, that sounds good,” you replied.

You set down the plate near the door, pulled down your pants and underwear, and squatted over it as you watched the girls kick and throw your clothing and belongings into a knee-high pile in front of the dresser, aside from Heather, who daintily picked up one piece of clothing at a time and placed it into the pile. You still thought it was weird, pooping intentionally in the middle of a normal room instead of a bathroom, let alone in front of girls.

You completed evacuating your bowels and picked up the plate containing your runny reddish-brown poo and held it away from body, trying not to look at or smell the disgusting pile on the plate. With the taste of Abbey’s poop still coating your mouth, you thought it very strange that you had a sense of what your own poop would taste like. The girls, finished with their task, swarmed like flies around the plate, looking at it eagerly. Natalie walked over to the desk and came back with a set of fine silver spoons, similar to the one you had seen Amelia use earlier.

“Thanks, James,” Natalie said, taking the plate and setting it down on the bed. The girls sat crosslegged in a semicircle around the plate. “Wanna try?” she asked, offering you a spoon.

“No!” you yelled, as if it was totally obvious that you wouldn’t want to eat your own poop.

“Suit yourself,” Natalie responded. The three girls dug into your poop with the spoons and started talking and giggling among themselves. You felt left out. Should you have taken Natalie up on her offer?

“I know, you should put on your uniform!” Natalie said enthusiastically.

“Okay,” you said with less enthusiasm. You were looking forward to wearing the girls' uniform for your entire school career less than spending the next ten years of your life eating girls’ poop. Maybe you could try to get it changed to something closer to what a boy would wear. You took off all your clothes and threw them into the pile.

“Wait,” Abbey interjected, gesturing at your crotch, “what’s that weird pointy thing?”

“No, yours is weirder,” you retorted, having seen her bizarre privates up close.

Abbey jumped up and off the bed and stood in front of you, her hands over her hips, sticking out her girly parts proudly. “Mine is the best and yours is weird, see for yourself!” You took her up on her offer got a closer look. You got down on all fours, your face inches from her crotch, gazing curiously from below at her crevice which ended in a weird little mound of flesh.

“He’s still not convinced!” Abbey yelled. “Come on guys! Show him how much better they are than his!” Natalie jumped off the bed and hiked up her skirt to display her private parts, which you examined closely and compared to Abbey’s, going back and forth between the girls. They looked almost the same, save for Natalie’s fair skin and Abbey’s comparatively more golden complexion, but they still looked different from each other in subtle ways. Heather stayed on the bed, engrossed in the demonstration in front of her and distractedly eating from the plate of your poo.

You stood up. “I still think yours is weirder,” you said. You remained unconvinced.

“No yours!” Abbey countered.

“Actually, Abbey, boy parts and girl parts are different,” Natalie explained.

Abbey thought this over for a minute.

“Ours are still better,” she muttered, and Abbey and Natalie went back to their places on the bed.

You grabbed a shirt, blazer, neckerchief, skirt, socks and the black pair of patent leather girls’ shoes from the neat stack of uniforms on the bed to the right of the room and tried them on. You had trouble with the brown neckerchief, but Natalie and Abbey came and helped you out. You would have to learn how to tie it later.

“Well, what do you think?” you asked.

Natalie laughed and Abbey clapped, seeming impressed. “You look really good, James,” Heather said, blushing. Was she actually talking to you because you were wearing girls’ clothes, making you seem more approachable to her?

You walked over to the dresser to inspect yourself in the mirror. You cringed at your feminine appearance at first, but when you studied it closer it didn’t seem as bad as you thought it would be. The shirt and blazer were just a normal shirt and blazer, and you liked the freedom you felt between your legs. The uncomfortable cold breeze blowing up your crotch was a different matter.

You could stick with this uniform or try to at least change the skirt to a pair of pants, which do you choose?
123221122.title: Yeah sounds good

choices: I’m still mad, but when you gotta go
Tell Natalie to go on someone else
1232211221.content:
You decided that the skirt was fine, but you might look into getting it changed later on, maybe you would talk to Amelia or Ms. Wilson about it.

“The pee and poop in the suitcase should be gone by now, wanna check?” Natalie asked. You and the girls walked over to the suitcase, and to your horror, you noticed three giant brown splotches against the dark gray vinyl. Your parents were going to be so mad! You hesitantly ran your finger over one of the splotches and observed that it was totally dry.

“The vaporizer thingy only works with certain stuff,” Natalie explained. You remember hearing Amelia mention something about specially treated fabrics that you couldn’t quite call to mind. You turned to Natalie, a little miffed.

“If you knew that then why did you poop in my suitcase?!”

“Sorry James, I didn’t know!” Abbey said apologetically, to which Heather nodded.

“Oh hey, it’s time for lunch!” Natalie said, glancing at the clock on the wall and trying to change the subject. “I still wanna eat so I’ll show James how to get to the lunchroom, you guys want anything?”

“Get me candy! And chips! And more candy!” Abbey yelled excitedly.

“What about you, Heather?” Natalie asked.

“No thank you,” Heather replied quietly.

You and Natalie walked out of the building in the direction of Elementary School, talking about the Academy and your experiences so far.

You stepped past the School’s double doors into a wide, somewhat crowded hallway. Toilets lined one side of the hall, and above them hanging on the wall were rolls of toilet paper, sinks, liquid soap dispensers, and fancy towels monogrammed with the initials JD hanging from towel racks. You noticed some of the toilets were in use by girls with white neckerchiefs on, their skirts and panties around their ankles.

Along the other side of the hallway were knee-high tables with cushioned tops, which were used by girls with pink neckerchiefs to change each other's dirty diapers, which some girls handed over to eager girls with brown neckerchiefs, and others tossing theirs into waiting wastebaskets.

On the toilet side of the hallway you could see some girls with brown neckerchiefs in various states of dress and undress taking turns relieving themselves on each other's bodies in different ways, with some having as many as five girls going on them at once, and others with only one. On the diaper side you saw brown neckerchiefed girls take turns pooping onto plates placed on the floor and eating from them with spoons on the diaper changing tables, and others eating straight from diapers with spoons.

You noticed some students, mostly younger girls, were out of place, like a girl with a brown neckerchief using a toilet, or a girl with a white neckerchief helping to change a diaper. These girls were eventually talked to by older girls, presumably prefects, who walked up and down the halls, and rejoined those of their House. You recognized Amelia somewhere in the distance kneeling down and talking to a girl younger than you, who was eating from a diaper with her hands. Amelia eventually handed the girl a silver spoon.

Natalie stopped in her tracks. “I really have to go poop James!” she said, holding her hands over her butt.

“Why don’t you just go in a toilet?” you said, pointing to the row of toilets on the side of the hall.

“I can’t do that, I might get in trouble with the prefects! And I can’t go poop on the floor either, it’ll be hard to clean. You need to let me poop on you!”

“No!” you yelled, stepping back, thinking of the soiled suitcase.

“Please, James, it's an emergency,” Natalie said, wincing.
1232211221.title: This uniform is fine for now

choices: The seat near the girls of different age groups
The seat with the girls playing a trading card game
12322112211.content:
You were still mad at Natalie, but you understood emergencies and accidents well.

“Oh all right,” you said in resignation.

As you laid down on the floor, Natalie pulled a curious little black square shaped device from the pocket of her blazer, unfolded it like a clamshell, and held it in one hand aimed at your body, pressing a couple of buttons with her other hand.

“Hey what—“ you started, and before you could finish your thought you noticed your shirt and blazer had disappeared.

“Where did my clothes go?!” you yelled.

“Relax, they’re right here,” Natalie said, pointing at the nearest towel rack. Something weird was going on. Well, maybe not that weird, considering.

Natalie planted a foot on either side of your body, tucked the back of her skirt up and over into her waist, and began to drop a pile of long, moist brown logs onto your upper chest as she moaned with relief. When she finished, you felt her warm pee, which flowed over the sides of your stomach. You thought you were going to be sick, but it wasn’t nearly over yet.

A light brown haired girl, maybe one or two grades below you, stopped and watched. “Can I go?” she asked Natalie.

“You can have the head!” Natalie replied excitedly.

“Yay!”

Before you had a chance to say anything, the giggling girl squatted over your face. Her pee sprayed over your closed eyes before flowing down the sides of your head, and a pile of her sticky brown poop hit you right on the lips, completely covering your mouth and nose. You gagged at the smell of the poop blocking your nostrils.

“Why didn’t you open your mouth?” the girl asked, confused. She dipped her finger into the poop and put it into her mouth before running off, giggling.

A group of girls you recognized from the Common Room, around your age or maybe slightly older than you, stopped by. “Is there still room?” one of them asked Natalie eagerly.

“Go ahead!” Natalie said, zapping off your skirt with the mysterious device, which made your eyes widen.

You felt their poop hit your body as two of the girls relieved themselves on your crotch and one on your knees. The girls stood up and gave each other high fives. “Thanks Natalie!” one of them said, and the girls walked away chatting happily.

Natalie stood up, adjusted the back of her skirt, pointed the device at you, and after she hit a few buttons, all the pee and poop disappeared.

“What was that?!” you yelled.

“It was a pottymob,” she explained.

“No not that!”

“You mean this?” she asked, waving the device. “It’s a portable vaporizer, but it can do lotsa other cool stuff too.” She pointed it at your clothes on the towel rack and it reappeared on your body after she pressed a few buttons.

You sat up, and Natalie dangled the device in front of you. “Lemme see!” you yelled, snatching at the device, which Natalie yanked away.

“Ah-ah-ah, not until you learn how to use it,” Natalie said cheekily, offering you a hand up, which you took.

You walked alongside Natalie, pondering what just happened. “So you can vaporize any pee or poop with it?” you asked.

“Uh huh, as long as it came out of a human.”

“So you didn’t have to use me as your toilet, you could’ve just gone on the ground.”

Natalie stopped. “Isn’t it funner to pee and poop on someone instead of going on the ground or in a toilet?” She winced when she said toilet. “It was fun for me to share my stinky poop with you, James. A pottymob is supposed to be for the happiness of whoever’s at the bottom of the pile, didn’t all the fun and stinkiness make you happy at all?”

As you and Natalie resumed walking, you couldn’t help thinking about it. It was one of the most disgusting experiences of your life. However, just as when you ate Abbey’s poop, part of you didn’t think it was all that bad, or maybe even found it enjoyable. You had to admit that Natalie was rather cute, and the various girls who relieved themselves on you were pretty too. You had no idea why this made their pee and poop any less disgusting, but you knew it was related somehow.

“Hey, don’t be mad,” Natalie said, sounding worried that you were angry at her instead of just deep in thought.

She looked into the distance, considering something of her own.

“So you like Abbey and her ‘candy poop’, huh?” Natalie teased, elbowing you playfully. Your face turned bright pink, seemingly answering her question. “I’ll help you out with her, don’t worry.” You didn’t know how you felt about Abbey, aside from thinking she was pretty and had cooties, but you felt a little relieved to hear that, if you could still trust Natalie.

“You know, you still have to choose who you want to sleep in the same bed with you, and hey look, here’s the lunchroom,” she said, as the two of you turned into an open doorway. She walked away too fast to see your newly shocked expression. You vaguely remembered Amelia mention something about having to sleep in the same bed as one of your roommates, but with everything else going on you had forgotten all about it.

Before you had time to contemplate any future craziness with your roommates, you stopped to survey the lunchroom. A vast ballroom-like space, filled with round tables draped in white tablecloths, the room was roughly divided into Diapers on your left, Potties on your right, and Scats in the middle, but there were tables here and there with different mixes of people from all Houses. Similar to the hallway, there was a row of toilets on the right, and changing tables on the left. Most tables had similar chairs with holes in the bottom as those from the Scat Common Room, but some, mostly in the Potty section, had little white bowls slid into the bottoms of the seats on rails, and others sat on mostly by Diapers had cushions placed over the seat for use as regular chairs.

In the Scat section, among people eating normal school meals, there were girls with plates on the floor underneath their chairs they were relieving themselves into, and some girls were pooping into the little white bowls on the bottoms of their seats which they slid out to pass along to a friend or eat themselves. There were girls with their butts hovering over plates placed directly on tables, and other girls lying down on tables eating poop directly from another girl’s butt. Some girls were eating out of diapers apparently brought from the diaper side of the room. You watched a small mound of poop disappear from the floor, and wondered if there was a vaporizer installed in this room, or just the Scat section. You spotted Natalie leaning into a table full of Scats, chattering away.

You noticed two lunch lines in the back of the room, one on the diaper side and one on the potty side, and you took your place in the lunch line on the potty side. When you got to the front, you were relieved to find a normal cart with a row of food on display protected by glass, though you weren’t used to such a large selection of main courses and desserts at your old school. You told the lunch lady you wanted the ravioli and a pudding, took your food, and you grabbed a bag of chips from the large snack selection along the middle of the back wall and placed it onto your tray.

You walked around the lunchroom looking for an open seat and noticed a spot open near Natalie surrounded by girls around your age and another one with Scats from all different age groups, though you were intrigued by the table near the front of the room with girls from different Houses who seemed to be playing a trading card game, which do you choose?
12322112211.title: I’m still mad, but when you gotta go

choices: Down the entire cup, you can’t back out now
Pretend to drink it but really just pour it onto the ground
123221122113.content:
You took your tray and sat down at the table of girls playing a trading card game, which upon closer inspection you saw was Pokémon. You knew this game! Your deck was somewhere in the pile of your belongings back in your room.

You watched a girl in a brown neckerchief lose to the pretty girl wearing a white neckerchief seated across from her, who looked to be about 10 years of age with auburn hair. The Potty girl slid out her bowl from beneath her seat and shoved it across the table, and you watched the losing girl eagerly eat the entire bowl of poo and walk away smiling. Why was everything poop related at this school, even Pokémon?

“You must really like eating my poop, because you just keep losing!” the girl boasted.

You watched someone else wearing a brown neckerchief lose, and you saw the winning Potty girl’s face strain as she squeezed out another pile of poop before sliding it across the table.

“I’m going to run out of poop pretty soon guys!” she gloated.

Just as last girl did, the Potty girl’s opponent eagerly ate the entire bowl and walked away from the table, grinning.

“Are you the new kid?” the Scat girl sitting to your left asked. She had brown hair and seemed to be a year older than you.

“Yeah,” you replied.

“I’m Stephanie,” she said, reaching out her hand, which you shook.

“I’m James,” you said. “This girl is really good!” You turned to watch another girl with a brown neckerchief face down the unbeatable Potty girl.

“Yeah, she hasn’t lost a game since, how long has it been now?”

“Since Priscilla left for Middle School,” the Diaper girl to Stephanie’s left informed her.

The Potty girl couldn’t help overhearing. “Oh don’t remind me,” she said, a disgusted look on her face. She introduced herself as Lydia, and you responded with your own name. “So much of Priscilla’s poop I’ve eaten, from so many diapers, just so much,” she said, shaking her head.

“Did you have to eat it all every time?” you asked in horror.

“No, just a little bit, but it was still just so horrible,” she groaned.

The entire table went quiet, and the Scats gave her a look.

“Well, I mean, it’s fine if you like eating poo and all but come on!” she shouted.

“Scat girls sure like eating your poop in particular, Lydia,” the older Potty girl to Lydia’s left observed, chortling.

“Yeah, and I like watching them eat it!” Lydia grinned fiendishly.

A thought had just occurred to you. All the girls that had lost so far were Scat. Were they losing on purpose? To eat Lydia’s poop? Because she was pretty?

You watched Scat girl after Scat girl come sit down at the table and lose to Lydia, and mixed in a couple of girls from other Houses who actually didn’t seem to want to lose and only gagged down a little sliver of Lydia’s poop, leaving the rest in the bowl on the table for the next opponent.

“So James, you play any Pokémon at your old school?” Stephanie asked.

“Yeah,” you replied, “except we play it different.”

“How so?”

“We play with Prize cards, which are 6 cards set aside by each player, face down, from his or her deck at the beginning of the game. These cards are chosen randomly. When you knock out a player’s Pokemon you take his or her Prize card. The first one to take all of their opponent’s Prize cards wins.”

The entire table went completely quiet for a good ten seconds or so.

“That sounds stupid!” yelled a younger girl seated somewhere to your right.

“So you just…lose your cards?” asked the Diaper girl to Stephanie’s left in disbelief.

“Yeah.”

“You don’t get to eat anyone’s stinky poop,” Stephanie said, baffled.

“Well, nah.”

“I think even I like it this way better,” Lydia said.

You started eating your ravioli, which you had barely touched since you sat down. “Hey, I forgot to get a drink,” you told the table. You started to get up, eager to see what kind of drinks they had.

“Oh that’s okay, you can have mine,” Stephanie said. She slid you a cup of clear yellow liquid with a little bit of foam on top. When you reluctantly put your hand around the cup you noticed it was warm. You quickly removed your hand from the cup.

“Who peed in this cup?!” you asked in shock, and Stephanie pointed to a redheaded Scat girl younger than you across the table from her, who waved at you.

“You really don’t seem to like all that Scat stuff, James, though knowing Scat they probably found a way to make you eat poop on your first day or something like that,” Lydia said offhandedly.

You nodded.

“They did?!” Lydia gasped and put her hand over her mouth. “Good luck with that then. You know you can still switch to Potty if you want, we’d be glad to have you.”

The idea of switching Houses was still something you had in the back of your mind, but as the day went on you had more and more of a gut feeling that you belonged in Scat.

“Hey, James is Scat through and through! In fact, he’s gonna chug this entire cup of Dawn’s pee!” Stephanie yelled, a giant grin on her face. Before you knew it, the entire table erupted in a chant of “do it! do it! do it!”

What do you do?
123221122113.title: The seat with the girls playing a trading card ...

choices: Ask to be let into a pottymob
Try to sneak-poop into a toilet when the prefects aren’t watching
1232211221131.content:
You couldn’t back out now. You sipped a little of Dawn’s pee and gagged as it hit your tongue. It was saltier than expected, but you didn’t completely hate the flavor. You gulped down the entire cup as quickly as you could and wiped your mouth on your sleeve as the entire table went up in cheers and Stephanie patted you on the back. You felt proud, and you thought about what your friends back home would say when you finally told them about all the things you did.

“Hmm, maybe I was wrong about you belonging in Scat, James…” Lydia declared, sounding weirdly impressed. “Does that mean you want to eat my poop now?” she teased.

You shook your head, but for once the idea wasn’t entirely awful to you.

“i’ll eat it!” Stephanie called out, raising her hand, which made everyone at the table laugh.

“Maybe next time I beat you at Pokémon again?” Lydia asked, smiling.

You finished eating your lunch, slid the tray into a window in the back of the lunchroom wall, and walked back to your room chatting with Stephanie.

“Who are you rooming with?” Stephanie asked.

“Abbey, Natalie, and Heather.”

Stephanie got a surprised look on her face. “Wait, you’re in second grade too? So am I!”

“I thought you were grade above me,” you said, equally surprised.

“Me too!”

You chatted about some of the antics you had with your roommates so far, and you said goodbye as Stephanie walked into 2-A, and you into 2-B. You came in and noticed the snacks that Abbey requested sitting on the desk. Everyone was busy getting ready for something, and you were astonished to see Abbey wearing an actual skirt for what seemed like the first time.

“Oh there you are, James,” Natalie said. She slipped a couple of papers into her backpack. “Our next class starts in ten minutes, you gotta get ready!”

“What is it?” you asked.

“Oh, English, it’s Scats only. Your new buttfriend Stephanie is gonna be there,” she teased. Everyone stopped and turned their heads.

“Stephanie is James’ buttfriend?” Abbey asked, surprise and amusement in her voice.

You blushed, not even knowing what a buttfriend was. “She’s not my buttfriend! Girls have cooties!” you yelled, as everyone, even Heather, looked at you with the same amused expression. Abbey and Natalie made kissy faces at you. You would probably find out what a buttfriend was soon enough, you figured.

“I saw you hanging out at the Pokémon table, look at you making new friends and stuff!” Natalie announced, and you could tell she was a little impressed.

You walked with your roommates towards your next class, but as you entered the School you realized you hadn’t pooped all through lunch! You felt a turd pushing its way out of your butt. You stopped to look around for a place to relieve yourself, as your roommates continued walking.

Where do you go?
1232211221131.title: Down the entire cup, you can’t back out now

12322112211313.content:
You hadn’t used an actual toilet in hours, and pooping anywhere else felt wrong somehow. You didn’t want to join Potty, but part of you missed being seated on a bowl attached to a plumbing system. You really had to hurry it up and unleash your load, you never felt so nervous about using a toilet before! You barely had time to squeeze out a few turds, and no time to wipe your butt, which didn’t feel right to you. You considered at least going on a bottomless chair for your next bowel movement, that way you could take your time without being rushed.

You didn’t know where your roommates went, but you had seen them disappear behind a bend in the hallway. You turned the corner and checked all the classrooms. Some appeared to be completely normal school classrooms with toilets and changing tables, while others looked like they had really weird stuff going on.

You finally saw your classmates in one of the rooms, and you waved at each other as they apologized for leaving you behind. You explained that you had to relieve yourself, which everyone understood. You walked in and saw the same familiar room layout, of changing tables on the left and toilets on the right, but being Scat you were seated in the bottomless chairs behind desks in the center of the room. When you sat down, you saw Stephanie who waved at you, and after you waved back, you turned and saw Abbey and Natalie make kissy faces, which made you blush.

The middle-aged woman teaching English was sitting on a toilet, but she got up to check her students’ work throughout the class. You read a few short stories about peeing and pooping from your hardcover school textbook, full of similar stories. You received your homework worksheets, and being a new student, the teacher gave you special homework, to write a short essay titled “What Poo and Pee Mean to Me”.

As you talked about the class, you followed your classmates to Social Studies, a class with all Houses taught by a young blonde teacher who had decided to forego using a toilet and poop standing up as she taught. During the class the girls were allowed to either use the toilets or change each others’ diapers right in the middle of class, which was weird to you. You learned about prehistoric societies and their various methods of eliminating waste, and your homework was to read from your textbook, all about peeing and pooping throughout world history, and answer questions.

You watched cartoons in your room with your roommates while doing homework until dinner. As you looked on with a familiar mix of disgust and curiosity, your roommates absentmindedly tried different ways to get their poop into each others’ mouths. For example, you saw Natalie climb onto the desk and hang her butt over the edge to poop into Heather’s waiting mouth as she was lying down on the ground, though most of her thin, long brown logs just ended up missing and hitting Heather in the face. Heather scraped all of Natalie’s poop into her mouth and ate it as she wore a blissed out grin. You saw Abbey poop into Natalie’s mouth as she was seated on one of the bottomless chairs that were in the room, Natalie poop onto Heather’s bare stomach and Abbey lick it off, and so on.

When all this was happening you relieved yourself quietly in the corner of the room more than a few times, wondering if you were missing out. They asked you to join in, but you flatly refused, much to their disappointment. You had enough poop in your mouth and on your body for one day. When you refused, they teased you about Stephanie being your buttfriend. They also took the time to play around with their portable vaporizers and take turns zapping on and off each others’ clothes, including yours.

Dinner was held in the Banquet Hall, an absolutely massive room which surpassed even the luxurious lunchroom in every way, but it still had the same basic layout. You grabbed a chicken soup and remembered to filled your cup with Coca-Cola from their large drink selection, after what happened at your last meal. You took a seat at the table with your roommates, Stephanie, and one other girl with long, wavy strawberry blonde hair with whom you were not acquainted yet.

“New kid, this is Bridget, Bridget, new kid,” Natalie said, as you shook hands.

“Where’s everybody else?” you asked.

“Oh, they’re too full to eat,” Stephanie bragged. “Bridget and I pooped in their mouths so much, and then we pooped some more!” Bridget and Stephanie gave each other high fives.

“So James, you like Stephanie, huh?” Abbey asked teasingly.

You and Stephanie both blushed and exchanged looks. “We only met because of Pokémon, we barely even know each other!” Stephanie said, laughing nervously, but everyone was still eyeing the both of you suspiciously with sly smiles on their faces.

After awhile, the table got to talking about Natalie and her various pranks she pulled through the years.

“Remember the time she pooped into all the Potty fifth graders’ shoes?” Stephanie said, and everyone laughed. “Nobody ever knew it was you!”

“Oh, oh,” Abbey started, “remember the time we were learning how to use the little evaporizer thingies, and Natalie shrunk Bridget down and trapped her in a pile of Natalie’s stinky poop and she had to eat her way out?” Everyone laughed except Bridget, who shot Natalie a look.

“That wasn't good, Natalie,” she said pointedly.

The table went quiet and looked at each other with concern.

“It was great!” Bridget yelled, as everyone laughed louder than before, and Bridget slapped Natalie on the back maybe a little too hard.

“Natalie does some crazy stuff, but she always helps us out when we’re in trouble,” Bridget pointed out, as Natalie smiled and blushed.

“If I ever need anything I always come to her and she knows what to do,” Stephanie began, “like that one time…”

You tried to get word in edgewise with the girls that had probably known each other since kindergarten, to mention all the crazy things Natalie had done to you that day, and your Natalie antics made everyone laugh.

After dinner, you sat around in the Common Room playing games on your iPad for awhile, trying to ignore the craziness around you. You went to your room, changed into your pajamas, and asked the girls about where to brush your teeth. Natalie led you to a room on the other side of the hallway with sinks and shower stalls, and you joked that it was weird that it was basically a bathroom with no toilets. Natalie mentioned something about separate rooms throughout all the different quarters and Common Rooms for visiting girls from other Houses to take care of their business, so the ones for Scat would have toilets and changing rooms.

You found your way back to your room, and as you opened the door you found your three roommates standing with their backs against the bed on the left side of the room: Natalie and Heather wearing cotton nightgowns, while Abbey was wearing a light blue shirt which barely covered her belly button, and of course no bottoms.

“This is it, James, time to pick your neeew bedmate!” Natalie announced flashily, shimmying her hands. “Though we already know you’re gonna pick Abbey,” she whispered quickly.

Abbey’s head turned at the mention of her name. “Huh?” she asked. “Aww, you really like me and my stinky candy poop, James?” Her face reddened as she tried to playfully force your head close to her naked butt, giggling while you resisted.

“That’s not true!” you shouted, blushing, as Natalie and Heather joined in and smashed your face into Abbey’s bare behind, rubbing your face into her butt. Abbey let a couple of farts rip, and everyone fell back laughing.

“Eww, smelly girl farts!” you yelled, spitting as you wiped your face with your hands.

“So James, who’s going to be your new bedmate?” Natalie asked, and everyone leaned in, anticipating your answer.
12322112211313.title: Try to sneak-poop into a toilet when the prefec...

choices: Poop first, then do something else
123221122113131.content:
In the weeks leading up to Winter Break, you had grown accustomed to the sights and smells of girls and their pees and poops: from barely being able to stand the smell of girls’ poop close to your face without gagging, to eventually eating a full load of poop without breaking a sweat. After about a month at the Academy you slowly joined your Scat classmates and their various poo-filled pastimes, but didn’t think much of it beyond just wanting to fit in and going through the motions. Although the subject didn’t completely bore you, girls and their poop didn’t seem to excite you as much as it did your classmates, and you wondered if you were missing something.

Almost everyone you knew had plans to leave the Academy over Winter Break, but there were those who stayed behind, such as Natalie, who mentioned something about her folks being crazy and strict but wouldn’t elaborate. You felt uncomfortable pressing her on it so you just let it lie, and you felt sorry for Natalie because she wasn't able to see her folks. All students leaving for the break had to turn in their portable vaporizers, and those that were misplaced or weren’t turned in were tracked down by the GPS trackers embedded in each one of the little devices. You wondered what was so important about them, as you hadn’t been issued one yet.

You heard of a plane hired by the Academy to take all students living in cities along the East Coast home for the holidays, but since you lived too far inland, you made plans to fly with an 8th grade Diaper girl named Jenna who lived in the same area. You wondered if others made similar arrangements. You flew in luxurious first class, paid for by the Academy, and Jenna instructed you to wear a diaper throughout the trip. Since she was the senior student, she set the rules. Jenna was happy to change your diaper as long as you were willing to return the favor.

When you arrived at home, it felt weird getting used to using toilets again and wearing pants on a regular basis. At first you had a couple of “accidents” where you forgot you weren’t at school anymore and just pooped where you were standing or sitting. Although your parents wouldn’t give up their master bedroom with its built-in bathroom, you had always lived in the room closest to the main bathroom of the house, so you weren’t far from a toilet most of the time. Also, there were makeshift bowls set up throughout the house in case you were, say, watching TV in the living room or eating in the dining room and couldn’t get to a toilet on time.

You got to play with your friends, who thought it was hilarious and legendary that you went to an Academy full of people who peed and pooped all the time, where you spent all day learning about and playing with pee and poo. They were jealous of your condition and wanted to join as soon as they could. However, when they learned the school was made up of nothing but girls they withdrew their offers.

You had a lot of time to think about your first semester at the Academy. You figured you should be enjoying yourself, since it was Winter Break, but you missed the Academy and your classmates, and you would rather be back there than home without them. You thought it was just loneliness and being apart from your new friends, but as the break went on you realized that it was also something else: you missed all the fun you had with your classmates and their poop. Thinking of your classmates’ smelly poop, the way it looked, smelled, and tasted, excited you in new ways, and you wondered whose poop tasted the best. You couldn’t wait to get back to the Academy to experience the girls and their wastes in a new light. Were you finally becoming Scat, just like them?

When your Winter Break came to a close, your parents arranged for you to meet with Jenna at the airport. You made it back to school a couple of days before classes started, but the Academy was buzzing with people, since most of your classmates were back from break already. You were hungry, but you were also holding in a poop that you had to squeeze out sooner or later.

Where do you go first?
123221122113131.title: Abbey

choices: I need time to think about it first
1232211221131311.content:
Of course you wanted to go to your room first, to see if the friends you hadn’t seen in weeks were back, and you also wanted to taste their poop as soon as you got the chance.

You opened the door to your room and placed your duffel bag down on Abbey’s and your bed, the one to the right of the room. All the girls were there, and you were glad to see each other. You talked about how the holidays went and what you had gotten for Christmas. Natalie gestured to the massive Barbie Dream House in front of the bookcase and the seemingly endless toys pouring out from under Natalie’s and Heather’s bed, sent to the Academy by her apparently guilt ridden parents. Abbey said she was really jealous, but you still felt sorry for Natalie. You learned that Abbey and Heather arrived the day before you did.

Since everyone was hungry and had just woken up, the group decided to go eat breakfast. You went to the Dining Room, a room smaller than the lunchroom with one massive cart serving breakfast along the back wall with every breakfast food and type of cereal you could think of. You received your plate of pancakes from a lady working the cart and poured yourself a glass of milk. You released the contents of your bowels as you sat down in your bottomless chair at the round table, across from the girls, who were all wearing nervous expressions on their faces. You didn’t remember ever seeing Abbey or Natalie nervous before, which made you suspect something was up.

“So James, we were wondering…” Natalie started, hesitating before finishing her thought and glancing at her friends who were seated on either side of her.

“What is it?” you asked idly, your mouth full of pancake.

“We wanna tie you up and do weird stuff to you with our poop.” Natalie spat out the words quickly. She breathed a big sigh of relief and took a bite from her cereal.

You swallowed your food and put down your fork. You were completely perplexed, but also a little curious. “Is this another weird Scat thing I don’t know about?“ you asked, looking from girl to girl with an amused smile on your face. You would have reacted a lot more harshly just three months ago, when you first arrived at the Academy.

The girls exchanged a worried look.

“No, it’s just…something we wanted to do,” Natalie stated, and the other girls nodded.

“But I wanna eat all the poo, you don’t gotta tie me up for that!” you yelled enthusiastically, to which the girls’ expressions softened in relief.

“That’s great James! You’re finally becoming one of us!” Abbey declared.

“I’m glad you’re starting to enjoy being in Scat,” Heather uttered bashfully, pushing her messy red hair past her earlobe.

The girls were right to congratulate you. Before the break, you were outwardly pretty indifferent to your classmates’ poop, though that just masked the conflicting things you were feeling inside. By the time the break rolled around you had joined the Scats in their poop-related activities, but only reluctantly. Now to the surprise of everyone, including yourself, you were finally all in with House Scat, though in hindsight it was only a matter of time. You always had a feeling you belonged in Scat.

“It’s not about that James, it’s just…” Natalie began, her voice trailing off.

Now you were more confused than ever. You thought about Natalie’s proposal for a moment. “If you really wanna do it so bad, why don’t you just take turns tying each other up?” you asked as you pointed your pancake-carrying fork at Natalie before putting it in your mouth, as if this completely novel piece of advice had never crossed their minds before you so wisely suggested it.

“Well, it’s not the same if it’s not a boy, with a boy it would just be so much funner, I dunno why, really,” Natalie giggled nervously, to which she quickly added, “you don’t gotta agree, if you don’t wanna do it we’ll never bring it up again.”

You contemplated it. If these three Scat girls, who had done everything there was to be done with poop, felt this nervous about what they were proposing, it was something outside of even the relaxed norms of House Scat. That would make it very weird stuff indeed. On the other hand, you were curious and ready to eat all their poop.

“Well?” Natalie asked, and the three girls looked eagerly at you waiting for your response.
1232211221131311.title: Your quarters

choices: I think I've had enough for now
I have a few suggestions of my own
12322112211313111.content:
You had reservations, but you were curious, and you trusted your roommates enough by now to let them do something like this.

“Yeah sure, I’ll do it, but mostly because I’m really curious what it is,” you told Natalie, and you watched as the girls’ hopeful expressions turned to excited smiles.

“Really James? We’re going to have so much fun!” Abbey yelled.

“Thanks, James,” Natalie said, a wide smile on her face.

After you made it back to your room, Natalie commanded you to take off all your clothes. You laid on the floor with your feet pointed towards the bookcase and your head pointed at the dresser. Abbey and Natalie took off their neckerchiefs, and Abbey tied your wrists together, while Natalie tied up your feet at the ankles.

The girls stood huddled around Natalie’s tablet, somewhere in front of your feet, so you could just barely make out what they were doing if you craned your neck. After a few taps an app opened up to a sentence with blank spaces. “I'll do it!” Abbey shouted with glee. Abbey pushed a button on the screen, and the blanks were instantly filled in.

“‘Abbey poops on his stomach, Heather rubs it in with her butt’,” Abbey read slowly from tablet screen.

“Eee I get to go first!” she shouted, pumping the air with her fist. Abbey squatted over your stomach and released a hot, messy pile of runny brown poop, after which Heather proceeded to squat down and rub it in slowly and deliberately with her butt. When girls were done they got up and eagerly made their way back to the tablet.

“That was fun! Who’s next who’s next?” Abbey asked eagerly, pressing the button. “‘Heather poops on his face, Natalie rubs it in with her chest’,” she read. Heather got up from the bed and released a warm pile of poop on your face, which you started to eat.

“Ah-ah-ah, not until I rub it in, James,” Natalie chided you. She took off her shirt, kneeled down next to your face, and smashed Heather’s turds against your face with her upper chest, moving side to side. When she stood up she had a brown streak of Heather's poop across her chest which covered both her nipples.

“Now you can eat it,” Natalie said, and you licked what you could of Heather’s smashed poop around your lips.

“‘Natalie poops on his chest, Abbey rubs it in with her…croach’?” Abbey read, sounding out the last word.

Natalie got up from her position seated on the edge of the bed to help Abbey out. She read the words on the tablet screen. “That says ‘crotch’, Abbey,” she explained. Abbey was still confused, so Natalie pointed to Abbey’s exposed nether regions.

“Oh,” Abbey mouthed when she realized what Natalie meant, giggling with an impish grin on her face. Natalie squatted over your chest and released her usual pile of healthy, moist brown logs. Abbey straddled your chest with her legs and rubbed it in with her girly parts, giggling at the way Natalie’s poop felt against her body.

As far as you could see after two or three hours of play, there were two sets of words, a name (Abbey, Natalie, Heather) and a body part (Face, Arm, Chest, Stomach, Crotch, Butt, Legs, Knees, Feet), and another name and a body part. Any combination of these could come up. A girl had to poop onto one of your body parts, and another girl (or the same girl, in some cases) had to rub it in with her body part. It was tough in most cases to rub poop into your stomach because of the way your hands were bound at the wrists by the neckerchief.

After awhile, you felt like every part of your body you could see from your position on the floor had been pooped on directly several times, and the parts that weren’t had poop rubbed into them by different parts of the girls’ bodies. The entire front half of your body, as well as your butt, were smeared in a layer of the girls’ poop which replenished itself faster than the vaporizer could vanish it away. The girls’ naked bodies were also covered in poop, only to a lesser degree.

Eventually the girls got tired of following the automatically generated directions in the tablet app and just took turns pooping on your body and rubbing it in. Abbey was kneading Natalie’s poop into your face with her foot, giggling at the squishy feeling, and Natalie was mashing Abbey’s poop into your upper chest with her buttcheeks. Heather was squatting over the makeshift receptacle created by your wrists being tied together on top of your stomach, releasing her bowels. Natalie looked at the clock and noted the time.

“Oh it’s lunch time,” she said. After Abbey expressed her disappointment at lunch being so soon, the girls unbound your wrists and feet, and used their portable vaporizers to clean up the poop which coated everyone’s bodies. After everyone put their clothes back on, the group walked towards the lunchroom.

“That was great!” you yelled, a massive grin on your face.

“I’m really happy that you enjoyed it, James! You didn’t mind being the one who was tied up while we rubbed our stinky poop into your body?” Natalie asked.

“No, I loved it!”

“That was the funnest fun thing ever!” Abbey squeaked. “But why does James get to be the one to have the most fun?” she whined.

“Isn’t it funner for all of us because James is a boy?” Natalie asked.

Abbey raised her finger and tried to think of something to counter with, but couldn’t. “Good point,” Abbey said, reluctantly conceding to Natalie. You could tell she still had her doubts.

“Where did you get that amazing idea?” you asked Natalie with curiosity.

“I got the app and the idea from a middle schooler I talked to during the break,” Natalie explained. The group left the building and made their way towards the School. “If you liked it, James, I have a couple other ideas I wanted to try out.”
12322112211313111.title: Yeah, why not

123221122113131111.content:
“Yeah, go for it Natalie!” you yelled, wondering what else she had up her sleeve.

During lunch, Natalie laid out her plan for the next few hours: it would be a competition, with you as the target for some events, and a judge in others. Abbey excitedly mentioned something about it being like the House Games. You made a small suggestion that you could have poop breaks, because during the game you played before lunch, you had been pooping yourself on the ground the whole time. To your surprise, Natalie suggested you wear a diaper, which would be changed by the girls whenever it got full. You agreed, since you had experience wearing diapers with Jenna, and Natalie had a lot of unused diapers lying around under her bed. What did Natalie even do during Winter Break?

You made it back to your room, and after Natalie fixed up your first diaper, the girls tied you up once again.

“Why I gotta be tied up?” you asked nonchalantly, since it wasn’t that you didn’t particularly enjoy being tied up, you were just wondering why it was necessary.

“Because, if you weren’t tied up would we be able to do…this?” Abbey quickly squatted down and released a pile of her warm turds onto your face. She sat down by the side of your head, supported by her arms and hands, and rubbed her poop in with both her bare feet, giggling.

“Abbey!” you tried to yell through Abbey’s feet working her smelly poop into your face.

“Sorry James,” Abbey whispered, covering her mouth with her hand and giggling. She scraped all the poop on your face into your open mouth with her feet. You chewed and swallowed down Abbey’s poop with a satisfied sigh, and thanked Abbey, who gave you a thumbs up.

First up was Urinary Marksmanship, which Abbey was excited about and certain she was going to win, since she was on House Scat’s wastesports team, as well as representing the Academy when they competed with other schools.

Abbey squatted down onto your lower chest almost fast enough to knock the wind out of your lungs, spread out her legs, and slid her butt around on your chest, trying to find the perfect place from which to pee. Finally satisfied with her position, she sent from her private parts a yellow arc of urine which hit you right in the center of your waiting, wide open mouth. As the other girls watched, you gulped down Abbey’s salty pee stream as fast as it could pour out of her open crotch, your mouth still wide open. Abbey stood up, proud of her performance.

“Not a drop out of place!” she shouted, and the other girls patted her on the back.

The other girls’ streams weren’t quite as precise. Natalie’s pee stream stayed on your chin and went up your nose before she found the right location and intensity to use for her arc, her pee trickling down your neck. Heather’s was almost perfect, but at the end she pulled to the right and hit you on the cheek.

“I win, I’m best at peeing!” Abbey bragged, as she danced around the room.

After that Natalie got squirt guns and cups out from under her bed. The girls peed into the cups and emptied their pee into the squirt guns. In the process they would’ve spilled pee all over the place, but fortunately they filled the guns over your face, which was there to catch their pee before it hit the floor. You stood up against the wall, with help from the girls, who took turns trying to shoot their pee into your mouth with the squirt guns from a few feet away. Then when that got boring, they aimed between your eyes, and after that got up close and shot their pee up your nose as they giggled, their pee trickling down the back of your throat.
