They emptied the squirt guns onto your face at close range and then filled them up again to shoot at each other. There was no clear winner, but Abbey seemed to think she won, and nobody really disagreed.

Then there was the the pee and poop taste test. First, Heather blindfolded you with her neckerchief, and the girls peed into cups. You heard the girls strain as they pooped onto different plates on the floor. Natalie handed you three cups of pee: one was really watery, one in between, and one really salty.

For the poop taste test, you had trouble moving around to taste the poop, as you were still blindfolded, so Abbey playfully grabbed your hair on the back of your head and smashed your face into the first pile, giggling as she rubbed your face into the unseen mound of smelly poop. The plate had healthy wet logs of poo, of which you tried to get as much into mouth as possible without using your hands. Abbey grabbed the hair on the back of your head and rubbed your face into the next pile, and when you were ready, the next. The last two plates both had runny brown poo, and they were tougher to tell apart.

Heather took your blindfold off and retied it around her neck. If you were able to see you would’ve probably chosen Abbey’s for both, since you enjoyed the thought of eating and drinking her pee and poop the most. However, since you had no idea who did what where, you chose the last, saltiest glass of pee, and Abbey cheered. For the poop test, you chose the first plate which had the most well-formed logs of poop, since it was the tastiest to you. It was Natalie’s turn to gloat, as Abbey’s disappointed shoulders slumped. Was the thing Heather said on your first day at the Academy true, about Natalie’s poop being the tastiest?

Since it had been a couple hours, the group decided to take a short break. The girls untied you, and you watched cartoons on TV and talked about everything that just happened. Natalie stepped out to the lunchroom to grab sodas and snacks for everyone, and replenish her diaper stash.
123221122113131111.title: Yeah, go for it!

choices: Why does anyone have to be potty?
1232211221131311111.content:
After a short break, Natalie fitted a fresh diaper to your waist, and you were tied up once again.

Natalie’s next idea was a butt taste and smell test, but as Heather untied her neckerchief to use as your blindfold, you needed clarification on the finer points of the event.

“Is this contest about whose butt is the cleanest, or what?” you asked, and Abbey and Natalie looked at each other and shook their heads at such a rookie question.

“No, James, it’s about whose stinky butt do you enjoy smelling and tasting the most. Just like in the House Games, duh!” Abbey exasperatedly answered, as if you’d asked the dumbest question in the world.

You sat up, your face roughly level with the girls’ butts. The girls took turns spreading their buttcheeks and backing their butts up into your face, so it would be easier to lick and smell each girl. Scat girls rarely clean their butts after they poop, and they poop a lot, so the smell from the girls' butts was strong, and their butt juice got up your nose and all over your face when you rubbed it into their spread buttcracks. You wouldn’t have been able to tell the girls apart on taste and smell alone, as they were all roughly similar, though you were able to tell which girl was which because every girl laughed when you ran your tongue against their butt to taste.

Of course you enjoyed Abbey’s butt the most, but in the interest of fairness, you declared it a tie. The girls offered to go again, but you declined, because you knew it would be the same result. The girls teased you and wondered why you didn’t want to lick their smelly butts again.

After that, the girls spit poop out of their mouths towards your face from a couple feet away as you stood against a wall. Each girl pooped on a separate plate, and exchanged it with a different girl: Abbey ended up with Heather’s poop, Natalie with Abbey’s, and Heather with Natalie’s. They took a portion of the other girl’s poop on a spoon and put it in their mouths to launch towards your face. The objective was to land the bits of poop in your mouth, but the only one to be consistently on target was Abbey, who was proclaimed winner. By the end, you had little portions of the girls’ saliva-covered poop sticking to your face, and the girls giggled as they lightheartedly pushed you down onto the ground and smashed it all into your face with their hands and bodies, as well as their remaining poop on their plates.

Then there was the fart contest. You sat up, blindfolded, as the girls took turns shoving your nose in between their buttcheeks and farting. Heather won, to the protest of the other girls, because she accidentally pooped when she farted and it got up your nose, which added something to her entry. Apparently, this would’ve disqualified her during the House Games, but the girls reluctantly let it pass. Then they decided to have a breath test, and you decided that the poopy breath of all the girls was bad, but in a good way. There was no clear winner.

After that you gave up the competition aspect for awhile, to Abbey’s loud protests. With a blindfold on you were laid down on the ground and told to lick a body part, which would be smeared in the girl’s own poop and brought up to your face. You had to guess what and whose it was.

You were able to guess body parts most of the time, but guessing who they belonged to was trickier. It started out fairly innocently: Heather’s arm, Natalie’s thigh, Abbey’s stomach, then Heather’s calf, Natalie’s foot, Abbey’s armpit, and so on like that for awhile. Then the girls moved onto their faces for a few rounds, starting with Heather’s forehead, Natalie’s nose, and Abbey’s cheek. It got more and more naughty as time went on: you licked poop off of every girl’s bare nipple at least once, and eventually ended up licking everyone’s buttcheeks and buttholes. By the end, they were shoving poop up your nose and asking you to identify which girl pooped it out by smell, and pooping directly into your mouth and asking whose it tasted like. After awhile, they forgot all about the game and just covered your entire head in a mound of their poop which they shaped and patted down as if it was wet sand at the beach, leaving a hole for your mouth to breathe and shove more poop into.

The group decided it was time for another break. They untied you and cleaned up using the portable vaporizers. Everyone sat around watching cartoons on TV and eating snacks.

“That was really fun! Wasn’t it guys?!” Abbey shouted.

You opened a bag of chips. “Is this what you guys usually do when you come back from break?” you asked.

“We usually just do stuff like this to each other without being tied up…” Natalie’s voice trailed off, as if she was thinking of something she wanted to say. You thought about why you were tied up, though you enjoyed that as much as the rest of it.

“Do you wanna be potty this semester, James?” Natalie asked after awhile.

“Yeah!” Abbey yelled, excited over the prospect.

“You mean like House Potty?” you wondered.

“No, be our potty, that we use to poop on all the time, I mean we’ll still poop on each other—“

“A lot,” Abbey added.

“But we’ll poop on you even more,” Natalie finished.

“Yeah, James, and it's only when you're in here with us, so you can still make Stephanie your buttfriend,” Abbey teased and made kissy faces, and Natalie joined in.

You were intrigued by Natalie’s latest proposal. “Well that doesn’t sound too bad,” you answered. “And Stephanie’s not my buttfriend!”
1232211221131311111.title: Continue

12322112211313111111.content:
“Sure, I’ll give it a try,” you declared, after a few moments of thought.

“Alright, James,” Natalie said, as Abbey cheered.

Natalie squatted down to get something from beneath her bed, and after a couple minutes of digging around, she produced a dog collar and leash.

“Why would you need that?! Is this what the person who’s potty usually wears?” You asked as you looked at each of the girls’ faces hoping for an explanation.

Natalie thought about how to respond to your question. “No, but I think you like this kinda stuff, because I know I really love doing it to you!” Natalie proclaimed, playfully punching you in the arm. She was right. There was something about the idea of being tied up, and now this that you couldn’t get enough of.

“Now take all your clothes off, we’re gonna be pooping on your body a lot,” Natalie instructed you, and you obeyed.

“Yay, he can be like our poopy little pet!” Abbey shouted excitedly. Natalie applied the dog collar to your neck, and Abbey took the leash and gently guided you towards her. She pooped a wet little nugget into her hand and smashed it into your lips. You ate the poop after you used your hands to get it all into your mouth.

“Good boy!” Abbey said, patting you on the head with her poop-covered hand. She squeezed out another nugget into her hand as a treat, and you licked it off of her open palm.

The group spent the next few hours before dinner trying to work the kinks out of the system they had set up. When the girls pooped on each other, rather than waiting for the vaporizer to do its job, they called on you to lick up the mess. Within less than two hours, you managed to lick the girls’ poop off the floor, every girl’s chest and stomach, Natalie’s back, various other body parts, and the girls’ faces. You were their potty pet, after all.

Of course, the girls peed and poop on you as well, mostly on your face and mouth but also on what felt like every inch of the rest of your body. It seemed that just as one girl’s poop vanished from your body, another girl wanted to release her bowels all over you. Sometimes the girls commanded you to lick their poop from your body, but mostly they left it alone, though you were expected to eat whatever landed on your face and mouth.

Before dinnertime, the girls were sitting around idly chucking towards your mouth pieces of their poop of all different sizes and consistencies. They told you to beg for their turds and catch them in your mouth as if they were doggie treats. When the girls noticed it was time for dinner, Natalie took the collar from around your neck and you got dressed after the girls cleaned their waste from your body with their portable vaporizers.

As the group walked to the Banquet Hall for dinner, the girls asked how you were finding your first few hours as their potty pet. You answered that today had been the most fun you had in your entire life, and that included the potty pet thing. The girls were very pleased to hear that.

Everyone grabbed their dinner and found a table with Stephanie, Bridget, and another second grade girl, Nina, who had shoulder length light brownish, dark blonde hair. The other girl in their group hadn’t come back from break yet. After you and the girls from 2-A talked to each other about your Winter Breaks, everyone at the table caught up on what the other group had done that day. The girls from 2-A were jealous of all the fun times you had, as they had just been sitting around pooping on each other as if it were any other day off from school. They talked about maybe borrowing you tomorrow or later on in the semester.

After dinner, you asked to be excused to the Common Room to play around on your iPad, and the girls agreed, after complimenting you on what a good sport you had been all day.

Later that night, when you were ready for bed in your pajamas, Abbey approached you with a question.

“James, I was wondering if you could sleep with your face against my butt? That way even when I sleep your face could still be covered in my stinky poop,” she giggled. A few months ago you would have found a question like this really strange, but now it felt like a totally normal thing to request of another human being.

“Why?” you asked, wondering if there was any particular reason behind her idea.

Abbey’s mouth spread into an impish grin. “Wouldn’t it just be funner?” she asked.
12322112211313111111.title: Yeah, it’s worth a try

choices: I don’t know about this, but I trust Natalie
Why don’t you shrink me down and have your own fun?
123221122113131111111.content:
“Yeah, sure,” you replied, almost without thinking. Things like this were becoming so commonplace in your life, it just seemed like another crazy part of being in House Scat. And you had to admit, the idea held a certain appeal to you.

After everyone said their good nights and turned the lights out, you aligned your body the opposite direction to Abbey’s and nestled your face against Abbey’s butt. She giggled as you slid your nose into her moist, smelly buttcrack. You tried in vain to fall asleep in this strange new orientation. Every time you thought you would fall asleep, another fart or piece of poop would leave Abbey’s butt and hit your nose, waking you up. Abbey switched positions occasionally in her sleep, so you would end up with Abbey's butt squishing your face, and you had to gently nudge her to make her move again. Even after you managed to sleep, all through the night you awoke periodically, sometimes with your face covered in Abbey’s warm poop. You knew it would take awhile to get used to, but you still thought it was a good idea, in theory anyway.

The next morning, you were left sleep deprived and groggy following a fitful night’s sleep. After breakfast, you were still adjusting to life as the girls’ potty pet, and the girls were messing around and watching TV. Natalie was just walking over to release her bowels all over your face when you heard the door open, and a horde of girls you knew to be the entire kindergarten class made their way into the room and stood between the two beds. They didn’t even ask why there was a naked boy lying on the ground wearing a dog collar, things like that were apparently just a part of life in House Scat.

“Natalieeeeee, we’re booooooored!” a girl with light blonde hair at the front of the group whined.

“Did you try sharing your poop with each other, like you learned in class?” Natalie asked.

“Yeah, but we’re still bored!” chimed in a girl with brown hair.

Natalie thought for a moment, then looked at you with that look in her eyes, the one she gets when she’s plotting something.

“I’ll let you play with the funnest toy!” Natalie proclaimed, to cheers from the kindergarteners.

“Funner than all thooooooose toys?” the blonde girl asked in disbelief, pointing to the toys pouring out from under Natalie's and Heather's bed.

“Yeah, so much funner!” Natalie exclaimed.

“Can we see it?” one girl in the back of the group asked.

“Wait outside while I work my magical magic!” Natalie instructed them, to even more cheers.

The girls dutifully made their way outside the room, and Natalie followed them and shut the door behind them.

“What toy?!” Abbey asked, excitement in her voice.

Natalie turned to you. “I need your help, James. I wanna shrink you down so you can play with them.” She noticed you giving her some serious side-eye. “Come on, James, it’ll be so much fun!”

Abbey seemed disappointed. “Aww, I thought it was a cool new toy you got for Christmas!” Abbey turned to you with a crazy look in her eyes.

“Now I want James to be my toy!” Abbey yelled.

“No, Abbey, it’s for the kindergarteners,” Natalie said.

“Aww,” Abbey groaned, disappointed once again.

“So what about it James?” Natalie asked, imploring you with her eyes.
123221122113131111111.title: Go for it

1232211221131311111111.content:
You had grown to trust Natalie’s instincts, but this was just way too far. The line had to be drawn somewhere. This seemed as good a place as any.

“No way, that sounds like a nightmare!” you yelled.

Natalie seemed to be expecting this answer from you. “Ah well, James, maybe next time.” She shrugged, knowing there as no convincing you.

“Though I’ll have to give that group of disappointed Scat kindergarteners something to play with,” said Natalie, thinking once again. “Oh I know!” she shouted, as if a lightbulb had just gone off over her head. She let the girls back into the room.

“Okay, change of plans! I can’t let you play with the best toy ever, sorry,” Natalie said. The girls wailed in disappointment, and you felt a twinge of guilt.

“But everyone can take one toy from under the bed!” Natalie yelled, and the group cheered.

“Really Natalie, to keep and play with forever and ever?” one girl asked, her eyes wide with excitement.

“Yeah of course!” Natalie answered. She noticed a girl eyeing her Barbie Dream House with a craven look in her eyes, who began walking towards it. Natalie moved to intercept the girl, standing between her and the Dream House.

“Except that,” Natalie said hastily, and the girl stooped her shoulders and walked away.

When every girl had their chosen toy in hand, Natalie noticed that there was still a massive pile of toys under her bed. She ended up giving away most of her toys to the group of Scat kindergarten girls that day. You saw a new side to Natalie’s character you hadn’t seen before.

The next day was the start of the new semester. You awoke to the smell and feel of Abbey’s long brown turd being smashed against your face, and you heard a giggle from the other side of the bed. Still sleepy, you ate it almost without thinking, licking into Abbey’s buttcrack to get the last bit of poop.

“Oh, thanks James, I was gonna ask you to eat that up,” you heard Abbey’s sleepy voice say.

You separated your face from Abbey’s butt, feeling refreshed after a good night’s sleep. You must have been already getting used to your new sleeping arrangements. That, or you were just so sleep deprived from the night before, you slept through all of Abbey’s various nightly bowel movements.

You started to get up.

“Wait, James!” Natalie yelled.

As you laid back down, the girls squatted back to back over your face, one on each side of your head. You watched as their buttholes opened up and buried your face in a massive mound of poop, their first voluntary bowel movement of the day. When they were done they giggled as they shoveled it all into your mouth and watched you consume the entire pile. You wondered if this would be a daily occurrence in the new semester. After everyone had gotten ready, the group started towards the School.

“Aww, school already?” Abbey whined as you made your way to the Dining Room for breakfast.

After meeting up with the girls of 2-A, you had a small breakfast of just a single cold Pop Tart, since you had already eaten so much of Abbey’s and Natalie’s poop. You made your way to your first class of the semester, Basic Potty Training, Scats only.
